New Records: Germany became the first team to reach the Euro 2024 knockout stage
Key Match Events: Jamal Musiala scored in the 22nd minute
Ílkay Gündogan scored in the 67th minute
Roland Sallai had a goal ruled out for offside in first-half stoppage time
Pre-Game Insights: Hungary manager Marco Rossi said his side could not afford to make any mistakes
Germany goalkeeper Manuel Neuer said the team needed to do their homework
Post-Match Reflections: Germany manager Jürgen Klinsmann believes Germany should still start their strongest team despite having the opportunity to rotate against Switzerland
Hungary manager Marco Rossi said Germany is possibly the biggest favourite to win the Euro
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was watched by German Chancellor Olaf Scholz and Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban
The atmosphere was described as 'febrile' and 'good and happy'
